title: The AI-100 Ice Maker Demo  ► NewAir
description:
Do you want to know how to have enough ice on hand for parties, game day, or your kitchen, or home bar? The AI-100 portable ice maker from Newair is a great solution for a variety of needs.

This portable ice maker can provide all the ice you need for parties, picnics, barbecues or just relaxing at home. It’s portable enough to use anywhere there's a plug, indoors or out, and it’s compact enough to fit on countertops or tables.

The AI-100 produces an amazing 28 pounds of ice a day, so you know you'll never run out. You can choose from small, medium or large sized ice cubes. And it works pretty fast; it makes a new batch of cubes every 6 to 15 minutes, so you never have to wait very long.

One innovative feature is that any ice that melts will get recycled back into the system to keep making more ice, so you never have to worry about leaving it too long. 

This kitchen ice maker has easy-to-use controls, and indicator lights to let you know when to add water, and when the ice basket is full. There’s no complicated setup, you just plug it in, fill it with water, and it’s ready. No permanent installation is required. It’s compact, so it fits just about anywhere.

This countertop ice maker can be transported anywhere there's a plug. We’ve had reviewers tell us about all they places they use it: 

- parties
- game day
- tailgating
- offices 
- RVs
- cabins
- boats
- picnics
- game rooms
- man caves

transcripts: Hi I'm Emily and today we'll be taking a look at the AI 100 ice maker from NewAir. This icemaker can produce enough ice for picnics, parties, barbecues, or just relaxing at home. It's portable enough to take with you indoors or outdoors and compact enough to fit anywhere like table tops or countertops wherever you may need it. The AI 100 can produce an amazing 28 pounds of ice per day, you can choose between small medium or large size ice cube and it works really fast it makes a new batch of eyes every 6 to 15 minutes so you never have to wait that long. One cool thing is if you can't get to it right away or you've left it for a little too long the melted ice gets recycled back into it making a new batch of ice with recycled water. It also has a drain on the side making it easy to drain the water when it's not in use. It has easy-to-use controls and lights letting you know when to add water or when the ice is full. It has a removable ice tray and a nice scoop making it easy to deliver ice wherever you may need it. There is no complicated setup you simply fill it up, plug it in, and it's ready to go. There's no permanent installation either and it's compact enough to fit almost anywhere, we've had a viewer tell us all the places that they like to use it parties in the office, rvs, cabins, boat it's pretty easy to take with you anywhere. Thank you for taking a look with me today at the AI 100 ice maker from NewAir. At NewAir trust is important to us we test each product line before we put it on the market to make sure it's reliable. We have a world-class dependable dedicated customer service team so your calls and emails go to real people and we've been doing this since 2002 so we've built a reputation as one of the best customer review companies online. That's why NewAir is a name you can trust.
